com.rublon.sdk.core.rest

Class RESTClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rublon.sdk.core.rest.RESTClient

  • public class RESTClient
extends java.lang.Object
    REST client class.

    Object provides an interface to perform an HTTP REST request.

    Author:
    Rublon Developers
